message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses a new method for continual classification learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper compares two different replay-based methods and evaluates their effectiveness using benchmarks constructed from MNIST and FashionMNIST data. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and computational linguistics (cs.CL). However, given the focus on classification learning and image datasets, cs.CV is likely to be the most relevant sub-category.
